mailSubject: Updated Checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC
mailBody:
Dear Surbhi,

I hope this email finds you well. 

I have reviewed and updated the checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC (LEI ID: K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32) based on the internal data and supplementary information. Please find below the finalized checklist:

### Finalized Checklist Table

| Checklist Item                        | Status     | Comment                                                                                  | Source                               |
|---------------------------------------|------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------|
| Company Address Proof                 | Validated  | Address proof is available with utility bill issued by London City Utilities.           | DIM_CompanyAddressProof             |
| Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey | Validated  | Annual accounts and Ellipro scores for 2020–2022 are available.                         | DIM_CompanyAnnualAccountsAndElliproSurvey |
| Company Bank and Postal Details       | Validated  | Bank and postal details are verified with available bank account and SWIFT code.        | DIM_CompanyBankAndPostalDetails     |
| Company Directorship                  | Pending    | Director information is partially verified; additional review is required.              | DIM_CompanyDirectorship             |
| Company Tax Documentation             | Pending    | Tax documentation exists but requires review and renewal.                               | DIM_CompanyTaxDocuments             |
| Company Regulatory Compliance         | Missing    | Organization does not include detailed regulatory compliance information in its report. | NA                                   |
| Company Business Scope                | Validated  | Business scope is available, highlighting leadership roles and services.                | DIM_CompanyBusinessScope            |
| Company PEP Screening                 | Validated  | PEP screening data is available and validated for the organization.                     | Attached Supplementary Data         |
| Company Revenue Details               | Validated  | Total net revenue of 158.1 billion dollars for the year ended December 31, 2023 is reported. | Annual Report                       |
| Company Market Capitalization Details | Validated  | Market capitalization as of December 31, 2023 is reported as 489,320 million dollars.   | Annual Report                       |

The finalized checklist has been saved in a JSON file for your reference. Please let me know if you need any additional information or if there are further actions you would like to take regarding the pending items.

Best regards,
Shubham Sahay
shubham.sahay@capgemini.com
J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC
